title: BARON SERVICES Font
content:
Hi friends

Please help me id the font used for the logo of BARON SERVICES  
Thanks in advance

Miguel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907165859im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/baron_5659.jpg)

 [‹ bad serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907165859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46933 "Go to previous forum topic") [Irish Hunger Memorial (NYC) typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907165859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46932 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernando

comments.content:
BARON is Eurostile  
SERVICES looks like an artificially slanted Helvetica.
